thread.title: Big Four Auditors Face New U.K. Calls To Break Apart

author: Oliver Griffin
title: Big Four Auditors Face New U.K. Calls To Break Apart

organizations.name: house of commons’ work and pensions committee

text: U.K. regulators should consider breaking up the Big Four accounting firms, two parliamentary committees said Wednesday, contending a construction company’s collapse shows U.K. audit firms have become a “cosy club” incapable of questioning companies’ finances as needed. In a joint report, the House of Commons’ Work and Pensions Committee and its Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy WSJ City PM: Italian Assets Under Pressure, Europe's Earnings Growth Slows, Who's Next in Emerging Turmoil?
